title: 44. Spa Etiquette: Boundaries, Self Awareness, Communication, Client Connection + Non-Verbal Cues.
description:
Hi Roomies!! In this episode I'm talking all about treatment room etiquette including:

This episode covers:

- important talking points you must have with every client

- connecting with your client

- don'ts of the treatment room

- respect for client boundaries + personal safety

- having self-awareness as a provider

- communicating to meet your clients' needs

- how to have an impactful consultation and more!

Thank you to today's sponsor, Alpen Glow Skin Spa by Courtney Parkhill.

You can use TESSAGLOW for 20% off your purchase! 

Colorado residents, book with Courtney!

Check out Courtney on Instagram
